title: Looking for RankedTeam Top/ADC/Support
body:
Hey, I am starting a ranked team in the start of season 6. I want to start practicing now and I'm in need of a Top laner and both ADC/Support. I want to be pretty active and successful, Add me in-game - AngusRoxyRuby1.

If you have any idea's on the name for the team, let me know! ^_^

replies.body: do you still need a support? i added you just before

I am interested in joining your team, i main top and adc, my adc champ is {{champion:67}} i can play other adc's but i prefer vayne considering my vayne build is highly unique, check my smurfs history (Mathtaborda), i have been playing that alot recently cause i have leaver buster on my main account and trying to get over tilt, i believe i should be fresh now, anyways back to buisness, my top lane champs are{{champion:92}}  {{champion:58}} . currently my champion main pool is short and may be for just a little bit, BUT, i would not underestimate my riven vayne and renekton, all have unique builds that are very powerful and they make me a powerful opponent, i have abit of an anger issue, but if i am not under pressure i can easily get passed it. my rank is Silver 4 season 5 and hoping to get higher in season 6, my vayne build is: {{item:3094}}  {{item:3087}}  {{item:3006}}  {{item:3031}}  or {{item:3072}}  {{item:3046}} {{item:3075}}  or {{item:3065}} , my Riven build is {{item:3071}}  rushj {{item:3053}}  rush {{item:3158}}  {{item:3075}}  {{item:3065}} {{item:3036}} , My renekton build is {{item:3053}}  RUSH {{item:3071}}  Rush {{item:3111}} or {{item:3047}}  {{item:3065}}  {{item:3143}} {{item:3075}}, Most of my adc builds are like vaynes simply because the vayne build has strength behind or ahead, ty for reading this and considering my application, Gl Hf
